text:
Is there any mmapping that goes on in the language server process? I’m trying to reconcile why:
- Task manager tells me the process is taking up 3GB, within 2 mins of starting up
- The LanguageServer and SymbolServer modules only having `summarysize` of up to tens of MiB (probed here <https://github.com/julia-vscode/julia-vscode/pull/2001>)
- MacOS’s “Instruments” probing app claiming that the backend julia process is only creating ~200 MiB of persistent memory usage during the time period where memory usage rises from 200MB to 3 GB

text: Not that I'm aware of... Should we move this discussion over to <#C013J5F9USH|vscode-dev>? I _very_ much appreciate you looking into this, and I think over in the dev channel we'll have the audience that is interested in the internals like this.
